description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. reTension combines the classic game of Memory with Trivia-like questions. Not a fan of trivia? Well we've got you covered too! Arcade Mode also allows you to play with classic cards. Or try the fast, fun and addictive Speed Mode, you match classic cards in four different difficulties, but watch out for resets!  This game is for mature audiences.
